author: reidak49
title: first to review
review: thats right first to review once again the raduka spinner is the most inacurate bionicle luancher there is a gear armthe sliver part of the blade is rubber so you can bend and that is all i have to review

author: Gus_263
title: Nokama Hordika
review: Same legs, feets, body, arms of the hordika. But this set is cool, with a mask and two finbarbs. The weapons characteristics are the same, have two colors, the set color and a normally silver. Other similarity is the spinner, all silver. The eyes are orange, a great color.

author: Carl
title: Not worthy of the name Nokama
review:
I'll get straight to the point: I do not like this Bionicle at all. I used to like blue Bionicles and after Nokama Hordika left the shelves of Moore Wilsons I started liking them again. 

Pros:
Good chest-plate
Rhotuka
Arm swivel mechanism
Feet

Cons:
Weapons are just plain weird
Mask doesn't look like it ever was a true Toa or if it ever wants to be one again
Left arm is extremely old

This review is kinda harsh but these cons are bad. 2/5 Nokama Hordika.

author: BionicleBOOM
title: Great Weapons!!
review:
Toa Nokama is my favorite Toa Hordika, especially as she is my only one.  I got her because the weapons are so cool and because I've always been partial to blue Bionicles with orange eyes (Gahlok, Boggarak, etc.).  I got Boggarak along with her.  Anyway, Nokama's color scheme is very cool, consisting of blue, orange, and silver.  The weapons are blue, but the silver part is rubber, so you can bend it around.  Nokama's mask is neat, and  the spinner, like any 2005 spinner, goes really high into the air.  The knee plates are the same as the Toa Metru, but are silver.  5/5, great set.

Pros:

-Blue, orange and silver color scheme

-Mask is neat looking

-Weapons

-Spinner goes way up

Cons:

-Kind of a clone

Please get this set!!  You'll be glad you took my advice!!  :D

author: Alemas
title: C'mon Carl, this Toa is VERY good!
review:
I was bewildered to see this Toa had a low rating, so I decided to put things right! This Toa features a Rhotuka spinner, twin "fin barbs", and a special right arm! The right lower arm is connected to the upper arm via a half pin/half axle connector, and a gear turns the lower arm up and down! This special arm features in every Toa Hordika! Onto the pros and cons:

Pros

The spinner flies VERY far
Cool weapons
Cool mask

Cons

None!

Overall, a set NOT worthy of a 2!

author: NickBrick
title: More like 4 and a half
review:
How could anyone give this set a 2/5 ? I got this set used so it did not have the rhotuka spinner. But the axes are great and look like ninja weapons. Nokama's mask is her face which I did not like. The gear function works great and is currently my favorite Bionicle gear function. 

Pros.

  •                                                    Axes
  •                                                    Blue
  •                                               Gear function

                                                  Cons.
 

  •                                                She has no face. Just two bohrok eyes

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Toa Hordika) - Toa Hordika Nokama Review
review:
This is a nice figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 32 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 48 pieces and it was 9 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 19 cents per piece which is a good value for a set like this.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8737-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be moved. On both hands we can see a weapon and on one arm we can also see a gear which you can use to adjust that arm up and/or down. On the back of the torso is a spinner which flies very well, too.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de


Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: tkettle9719
title: Hordika: Bionicles of similarity
review:
I got this set at Ross, I believe, and completed my collection of the Hordika, even though I never got the brown one. I like this set quite a lot, but I will say that it is too similar to other Hordika.

Pros

  • -This Hordika has the most amazing water axes ever, and are awesome down to the little spikes.
  • -The Rhotuka spinners, when proplerly launched, work amazingly, maybe a bit too far, though.
  • …

Cons

  • -The new masks look cool, but aren't my thing.
  • -Take off a couple of pieces and colors, and the whole body looks exactly the same as the one in any other Hordika set.
  • …

This set is really cool, and is a star because of the spinners and the weapons, but armor is done too horrendously to be considered great. Buy it, but only if you have 1 or none of these.
